content: The face of a child shows their joy when they get a word of encouragement or a helping hand. We know it brings joy to us as children but for some reason we forget when we are all grown up. Jesus’ words echo in my mind, “whatever you have done for the least of these you have done for me.” There are millions of people who are the “least of these” in our world, and you usually don’t have to go further than a few blocks to find them.
